subject: Greetings,
body:
Greetings,
Compliment, My Name is Fred Mark , I have a very business investment  that will benefit both of us. If you are interested, come back to me for more details.
God bless you,
Best Regards
Fred Mark
+17153882602
Investment Consultant
Time-Board Investments
28 Church Road
Stanmore
London HA7 4XR

subject: Re: Greetings,
body:
Dear Fred Mark,

Thank you for your message. I'm interested in hearing more about this business investment opportunity that you mentioned. Could you please provide me with more details?

Best wishes,
Allison

subject: acknowledgement
body:
dear   Allison
Thanks for your email,  I have decided however to give you a very brief
overview of our company (Colonial Funding Group, LLC)
 An Investment, Financial and Wealth Management Company with a whole lot of
packages which could be found on our website.


Our staffs consists of consultants who have many years of experience in
Investment, Loan, Finance and Wealth Management that reside in major cities
around the globe. These Consultants/Professionals have vision, drive and
proven track records in multiple market environments and they are uniquely
capable of delivering on any opportunity given to them.

Also we have clients (Investors) which comprise mostly of business
entrepreneurs (business men and women) looking for alternatives sources of
income with a niche for investment in stable economy in countries around
the world that has a solid business environment that encourages foreign
investors..

WHAT WE ARE LOOKING FOR

We are looking for companies/individuals  that wants    personal Loans,
companies or people with good, viable and legitimate Business Proposal that
needs funding to start up or even an existing business that needs funds to
stabilize or resurrect, also we can negotiate an acquisition where
necessary, we are open to listen to any proposal on these plans cos we
offer both Joint Venture/Partnership business relationship and also grant
BUSINESS OR PERSONAL LOANS depending on the customer's need.

 We have various packages but to make this introductory email as brief as
possible let us limit the services to this few
. We always want to know what will be done with the funds if granted, if we
find your proposal interesting/viable,.

when you tell us the kind of loan you want then I will send you  our Loan
Application form for you ,

Hope we addressed most of your questions here but if you have any
question/s or if our explanation does not relate to the package you want,
feel free to ask for more clarifications.

While on it please get back to us so that we will know that you received
our email, so tell me if you want individual loan or company loan so that
we will process the loan



Fred Mark
